title: Gunner
description: I'll screw any woman I want, even the enemy.As a sniper in the military, I shot on sight.But now the only thing I have eyes for is Brooklyn, the new bartender at PJ's.Her curvy hips, those pouty lips, I want to touch every inch of her skin.I'll bend her over my bike and show her how a Bad Disciple really rides.But Brooklyn is hiding something. A secret that could rip us and the club apart. I killed her brother overseas. And now it haunts me in our streets. Iâ€™ll convince Brooklyn to stay with me. I never miss a target, and this time the bullseye is her heart.
author: Savannah Rylan
